column1: '''''ampa''''' is a noun meaning "hook" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>

left]]''Ampa'' is also the name in Quenya of the fourteenth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>   It is the second letter of the fourth grade or [[Tyellë]], which contains "voiced spirants", and it is the fourth letter of the series of labial consonants, the ''[[Parmatéma]]''.<ref name="Letters">{{App
column3: Letters}}</ref>  In standard Quenya spelling ''Ampa'' represents '''MP'''<ref name="Names"/> but in all other modes it represents '''V'''.<ref name="Letters"/>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Ivi'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>

column1: * [http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf/qlist.htm Quenya Corpus Wordlist] edited by [[Helge Fauskanger]]
